channel.title: Computer screen sound
channel.description: I have one of my xbox 360's plugged into my computer screen. My computer screen's input options are HDMI and VGA. I have the HDMI plugged in. I have external speakers and I bought a small USB sound adapter to plug them in with in hope of getting sound. I plugged this into my xbox: http://www.ebay.com/itm/280924751343 and it didn't work. What could I use to plug my external speakers/headphones into? There is no input on the back of my screen. The xbox itself doesn't have a 'sound problem', I plugged it into a TV and the sound came out just fine. Right now it's just a pain in the ass playing a game without any sound whatsoever... Kind of takes all the thrill out of the game.

item.title: Computer screen sound
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

So to get this entirely straight…

This: http://www.ebay.com/itm/6-in-3-5mm-Female-to-Dual-RCA-Male-Audio-Splitter-Adapter-Cable-2-Pack-/280775677473

and this: http://www.ebay.com/itm/Insten-HDMI-AV-RCA-L-R-Optical-Audio-Cable-Adapter-For-Xbox-360-/200777599362

will plug together and then the other end of the splitter will plug into my speakers and it will all work?

Read full topic

item.title: Computer screen sound
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

You’ll need a 3.5mm to RCA Input splitter. So the Red and White cables from the 360 go into the RCA inputs on the splitter, the other side is a 3.5mm that you can plug into the speakers. If there is 3.5mm cable coming from the speakers (standard) than get a splitter that has a 3.5mm input on one end, and Red/White (RCA) on the other end.

Example:

Read full topic

item.title: Computer screen sound
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

I have one of my xbox 360’s plugged into my computer screen. My computer screen’s input options are HDMI and VGA. I have the HDMI plugged in. I have external speakers and I bought a small USB sound adapter to plug them in with in hope of getting sound. I plugged this into my xbox: http://www.ebay.com/itm/280924751343 and it didn’t work. What could I use to plug my external speakers/headphones into? There is no input on the back of my screen. The xbox itself doesn’t have a ‘sound problem’, I plugged it into a TV and the sound came out just fine. Right now it’s just a pain in the ass playing a game without any sound whatsoever… Kind of takes all the thrill out of the game.
